snippet: The roadside attack occurred in relatively peaceful Bamiyan Province. Another attack, an ambitious assault in Kandahar, resulted in civilian and military injuries, but no deaths.
abstract: Taliban strikes multiple targets across Afghanistan, killing five police officers with a roadside bomb in a relatively peaceful province but fails to inflict heavy casualties with their multipronged assault in Kandahar.

byline.original: By MATTHEW ROSENBERG and HABIB ZAHORI

lead_paragraph: The roadside attack occurred in relatively peaceful Bamiyan Province. Another attack, an ambitious assault in Kandahar, resulted in civilian and military injuries, but no deaths.

headline.seo: Taliban Kill 5 Afghan Police Officers With Roadside Bomb
headline.main: Taliban Roadside Bomb Kills 5 Afghan Police Officers
headline.print_headline: Taliban Bomb Kills 5 Officers In Afghanistan
